comments.body: Do we actually use this function somewhere outside of this module? If not, I think there are similar cases in other modules defining handlers.
Yep, this is some of the dead code to clean up (in this case just an export, but still useful to kill).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +6,10 @@-- | Gather code lenses like scenario execution for a DAML file.
module DA.Service.Daml.LanguageServer.CodeLens
    ( handle
    , setHandlersCodeLens
    ) where
